name: Solar Rocket Wanderer
description:
Explore the celestial bodies around the solar system!

Collect all of the blue orbs to win.

Don't get too close to the sun, or any of the planets for that matter.

Interact with gravity and slingshot yourself off of the planets' gravitational pull!

Leave any feedback in the comments, I do not plan to add much more as this is just to practice and increase my skills in Unity but I would be glad to add anything anyone wants as long as it is simple enough!
